0.0.7.desc:
Fixed Chamber of Sages softlock
Settings are now set in AppData/z17-randomizer (you can copy/paste your old configs and rename them)
Removed portals_open option (you will need to remove this from your settings toml)
Fixed logic in Eastern Palace that could place Small Keys past the Boss Room in non-glitched logic

0.0.8.desc:
Enable Night Mode when starting a new file. This will last until visiting Lorule.
Receive Bracelet from Bow Item Slot gift on start, unless shuffle_bracelet is set to true
Nuke Standard Mode and its misc options
Shady Guy Trigger activated from game start
Ravios Sign trigger already activated from game start
Return Bombs to their Regular variety
Fix Hyrule Hotfoot placement logic
Always start with Y Button Enabled

shuffle_bracelet.comment: Shuffles the location of Ravios Bracelet

0.0.9.desc:
Implement auto-retry for seed generation
Glitched Logic now guarantees 10 Maiamai are available for Nice Bombs
Fully remove golden bee option from logic
Night Mode is now an experimental option that can be toggled
Premium Milk actors added, can now show up in Shop or Merchant
Greatly improve UX logging

shuffle_bracelet.comment: Shuffles the location of Ravios Bracelet

night_mode.comment: Modifies the shaders in a way where it feels like its nighttime in your randomized game
